skills.skill: SAP PM with Pipelines and Storage Terminals

duties_responsibilities.duty: Understand and analyze the process of creating equipment, work orders, maintenance plans, and scheduling plans in SAP PM.
Create a how-to instruction manual for the SAP PM process based on the existing process documentation.
Provide knowledge training and transfer to users on the SAP PM process.
Be available for additional questions and future configuration changes post-project completion.
